snippet: The Guatemalan photographer Daniel Hernandez-Salazar has devoted himself to documenting not just the violence that has wracked his country, but reminding his countrymen of the need to find justice.
abstract: The Guatemalan photographer Daniel Hernandez-Salazar has devoted himself to documenting not just the violence that has wracked his country, but reminding his countrymen of the need to find justice.

headline.main: Angels Watch Over Memories of War
